DOC.brief_summary: The present study design investigate whether timed protein supplementation increase skeletal muscle mass frail elderly population .
DOC.brief_title: Protein Supplementation Promote Muscle Protein Anabolism Frail Elderly People
DOC.criteria: Frail elderly individual Able understand perform study procedure Type I type II diabetes ( fast blood glucose level â‰¥7,0 mmol ) No recent history ( within 2 year ) participate regular resistance exercise training program ( general questionnaire ) Use anticoagulation medication ( except Acetyl Salicyl acid ) Renal insufficiency ( eGFR < 60 mL/min/1.73 m2 ) Allergic sensitive milk protein
